Module com.jlbabilino.json

Package com.jlbabilino.json

package com.jlbabilino.json
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    TypeMarker<T>
    This interface is used to hold type information at runtime.
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    JSON
    This class wraps a JSON file into an object.
    JSONArray
    This JSONEntry holds an array of JSONEntry types.
    JSONBoolean
    This class wraps a boolean value in a JSONEntry.
    JSONDeserializer
    This class is used to deserialize JSON into Java objects.
    JSONEntry
    This abstract class is the super class of every type of entry possible in a JSON structure.
    JSONFormat
    This class models all formatting options for JSON exporting.
    JSONNull
    This class wraps a null value in a JSONEntry.
    JSONNumber
    This class wraps a Number value in a JSONEntry.
    JSONObject
    This class represents a JSON object type.
    JSONParser
    This class takes a String in the format of JSON, parses it, and outputs its equivalent in this library.
    JSONSerializer
    This class takes Java object inputs and converts them to JSON.
    JSONString
    This class wraps a String value in a JSONEntry.
  • Enum Class Summary
    Enum Class
    Description
    JSONEntry.JSONType
    This enumeration can indicate a type of JSON entry.
  • Exception Summary
    Exception
    Description
    JSONDeserializerException
    This exception is thrown by JSONDeserializer if there is an error while deserializing.
    JSONKeyNotFoundException
    This exception is thrown when a user attempts to retrieve a keyed entry from a JSON object that does not contain an entry with that key.
    JSONParserException
    This exception is thrown when a user attempts to parse a JSON file, but there is an error.
  • Annotation Interfaces Summary
    Annotation Interface
    Description
    DeserializedJSONArrayItem
    This annotation marks a field or parameter as a target for deserialized JSON array data.
    DeserializedJSONConstructor
    This annotation marks a single constructor in a JSONSerializable class as the target for JSON deserialization.
    DeserializedJSONDeterminer
    Marks a specific type of method in a JSONSerializable interface or abstract class as the "determiner method." The determiner serves as a basic way to achieve polymorphisim in JSON deserialization.
    DeserializedJSONEntry
    This annotation marks a field or parameter as a target for deserialized JSON entry data.
    DeserializedJSONObjectValue
    This annotation marks a field or parameter as a target for deserialized JSON object data.
    DeserializedJSONTarget
    This annotation marks that a method should be invoked during deserialization, using the provided JSON data as parameters.
    JSONSerializable
    This annotation marks a type as being JSON serializable.
    SerializedJSONArrayItem
    This annotation is used to indicate that a field value or method return value should be serialized into JSON.
    SerializedJSONEntry
    This annotation is used to indicate that a field value or method return value should be serialized into JSON.
    SerializedJSONObjectValue
    This annotation is used to indicate that a field value or method return value should be serialized into JSON.
